about_the_game:
Staying in Texas, we get another offer to work with Gemma McShay. But this job might bring down more attention than we're willing to take at the moment. It'd be best if we could put the heat on someone else. A different kind of gang. Luckily, Gemma has just the thing…

The Following is included in High Octane Tailor Pack:

  • 2 Outfits with variations
  • 6 Masks
  • 2 Gloves
New outfits
The following outfits are included in High Octane Tailor Pack:
Road Rage - Biker Vest
With variations
  • Reckless
  • Screw Loose
  • Arsonist
  • Royal Pain
Hell on Wheels - Biker Jacket
With variations
  • Route 66
  • Bad to the Bone
  • Black Magic
  • Fast Lane
New masks
The following masks are included in High Octane Tailor Pack:
  • Way of the Texan
  • Funny Guy
  • Speed Freak
  • Chrome Dome
  • Daredevil
  • The Reaper


New gloves
The following gloves are included in High Octane Tailor Pack:
  • Chrome and Crossbones
  • Red Handed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *:Windows 7
  • Processor:2 GHz Intel Dual Core Processor
  • Memory:4 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (512MB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows 10
  • Processor:2.3 GHz Intel Quad Core Processor
  • Memory:8 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Nvidia & AMD (1GB VRAM)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Storage:83 GB available space
  • Sound:DirectX 9.0c compatible

short_description: The High Octane Tailor Pack contains everything you need to step into the shoes of a biker, literally! Check it out here.
